Changes the current portal theme.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"theme":{"oneOf":[{"enum":["Base","Dark","System"],"type":"string","description":"[Base - Base, Dark - Dark, System - System]","example":"Base"},{"enum":[0,1,2],"type":"integer","description":"[0 - Base, 1 - Dark, 2 - System]","example":0,"x-enum-varnames":["Base","Dark","System"],"x-enum-descriptions":["Base","Dark","System"]}],"description":"The theme type.","title":"DarkThemeSettingsType"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The theme settings request parameters.","title":"DarkThemeSettingsRequestDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
